author: ddas
msg: HADOOP-3221. Adds org.apache.hadoop.mapred.lib.NLineInputFormat, which splits files into splits each of N lines. N can be specified by configuration property mapred.line.input.format.linespermap, which defaults to 1. Contributed by Amareshwari Sriramadasu.

author: mor
msg: patch from Jyotsna Rathore for Converting Lead to Contact/Accont in SFA for Jira Issue OFBIZ-1792 (https://issues.apache.org/jira/browse/OFBIZ-1792)

author: ashish
msg: Applied patch from JIRA issue (Add partyType in the search criteria of findPaty service) :- https://issues.apache.org/jira/browse/OFBIZ-1793
Thanks to Jyotsna Rathore for working on this.
This changes will be used in the upcoming patch on SFA.
